Headline: Temporary #54 Cicero Reroute at near Cermak/24th
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted near Cermak/24th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, 49th Place, 24th Place into terminal, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Cermak/24th.

Allow extra travel time.
